content.rendered:
In the London of the 1970s, in the midst of the punk rock revolution, Estella, the young vagabond, uses her wit and creativity to make a name for herself with her clothing designs. He befriends two thieves who like the mischievous girl; together they thrive on the streets of London. One day, Estella’s sense of fashion attracts the attention of Baroness von Hellman, the disarmingly chic fashion legend. However, their new working relationship starts a chain of events and discoveries that bring out Estella’s flamboyant side.

Directed By Craig Gillespie

Writers: Dana Fox. Tony McNamara. Aline Brosh McKenna

Stars: Emma Stone. Emma Thompson. Joel Fry
